title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic Analytics in Action (AIM295)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理分析实战 (AIM295)
abstract: Analytics and data science are at an inflection point. The first wave of agentic analytics—HITL (human-in-the-loop), goal-driven agentic AI systems that reason, plan, execute and learn across data and models—is coming to life, delivering massive value by accelerating decision velocity in organizations. In this session, ZS MAX.AI presents real-world examples of organizations using agentic forecasting, segmentation, content intelligence, on-demand customer analytics and more. We will explore the power of AWS to deploy these new-age agentic analytics systems to unlock value through specific use cases and tackle key challenges including enterprise enablement, scaling and domain customization. This presentation is brought to you by ZS, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 分析和数据科学正处于拐点。第一波代理分析——HITL（人在回路中）、目标驱动的代理AI系统，能够跨数据和模型进行推理、规划、执行和学习——正在成为现实，通过加速组织中的决策速度来创造巨大价值。在本次会议中，ZS MAX.AI展示了组织使用代理预测、细分、内容智能、按需客户分析等的真实案例。我们将探索AWS部署这些新时代代理分析系统的强大能力，通过具体用例释放价值，并解决包括企业赋能、扩展和领域定制在内的关键挑战。本演示由AWS合作伙伴ZS为您呈现。
